longDescription: Unable to log into HR portal since password reset. The system keeps saying invalid credentials.
The password reset link on the HR portal does not send any email. Tried multiple times with no success.
Employee reports being unable to access HR portal due to access permission issues after department transfer.
Latest salary details not showing in HR portal. The employee was promoted last month but pay hasn't been revised.
Employee received half salary this month. Needs urgent attention from payroll department.
The employee's leave request was rejected automatically without manager review. System glitch suspected.
The 'Apply Leave' button is greyed out in HR portal. Employee unable to submit new leave request.
The laptop issued by HR is malfunctioning frequently. Employee has requested a replacement as per IT asset policy.
Dependent details added last month are not reflected in the medical insurance policy summary on the HR portal.
Session times out within 1 minute of login on the HR portal. Employee cannot complete tasks.
Employee's leave balance shows negative even after recent approval. May need manual adjustment.
Employee submitted claim two weeks ago but status still shows pending approval in HR portal.
Two-factor authentication fails to send OTP for HR portal access. User cannot log in.
Employee reports incorrect tax deductions in the recent payslip. HR payroll team needs to verify.
Employee cannot edit address details in the HR portal profile section. The save button is disabled.

shortDescription: Leave request not showing in approval queue
longDescription: Manager cannot see subordinateâ€™s leave request in HR system despite confirmation email being sent.
The HR help portal takes more than 2 minutes to load the dashboard page for some users.
No confirmation emails are received after submitting HR requests. Might be mail server or config issue.
Error 502 appears while submitting timesheet for approval. Tried multiple browsers, same issue.
Employee transferred from another region cannot log into new HR instance. Possibly linked to regional domain mapping.
